_header: How hard it was and what distress
_description: Christ speaks from the Cross — one monorhyming quatrain in John Grimestone’s sermon book explicating ‘Mors mea quam dura fuir, indicat ista figura’, which precedes it

NLS18721.Transcription:
Hou hard it was & wat distressemy detȝ þe sewith
                    þis liknesseÞus dere i haue þoru my godnessebouth
                    mankende fro wrechednesse
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 33.
